body_html:
I believe the problem is in the variable creator which only sees a partial name: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/collective_all_reduce_strategy.py#L147 and therefore it assigns same key for different variables.

Let me see whether there is a workaround. I am not sure why pure Estimator model doesn't have this problem.

body:
I believe the problem is in the variable creator which only sees a partial name: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/distribute/python/collective_all_reduce_strategy.py#L147 and therefore it assigns same key for different variables. 

Let me see whether there is a workaround. I am not sure why pure Estimator model doesn't have this problem.
